#sidebar StringCommandsSidebar

= GETBIT _key_ _offset_ (Redis >= 2.1.8) =
_Time complexity: O(1)_

 Returns the bit value at _offset_ in the string value stored at _key_.

When _offset_ is beyond the string length, the string is assumed to be a contiguous space of 0 bits and 0 is returned. When _key_ does not exist and empty string is assumed and 0 is returned.

== Return value ==

[ReplyTypes Integer reply], specifically: the bit value stored at _offset_.
